content: To the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David.
They are corrupt, they have committed repulsive  unspeakable deeds;
There is no one who does good.
The  has looked down from heaven upon the children of men
To see if there are any who understand (act wisely),
Who [truly] seek after God, [longing for His wisdom and guidance].
They have all turned aside, together they have become corrupt;
There is no one who does good, not even one.
